exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "∑ l (fun i : nat => power i r)" in the current goal.

exceptions.tactic: apply sum_powers_injective with (r := r) (n := l) (f := fun i => i) (m := l) (g := fun i => i).
exceptions.exn: In environment r : nat Hr : 2 <= r l, w : nat H : 1 + (r - 1) * w = power l r H0 : forall (r n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (m : nat) (g : nat -> nat), 2 <= r -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> g i < g j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (g i) r) -> n = m Unable to unify "l = l" with "∑ l (fun i : nat => power i r) = w".

In environment H0 : forall (r n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (m : nat) (g : nat -> nat), 2 <= r -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> g i < g j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (g i) r) -> n = m /\\ (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = g i) r : nat Hr : 2 <= r l, w : nat H : S ((r - 1) * w) = power l r Unable to unify "2 <= r" with "∑ l (fun i : nat => power i r) = w".
Found no subterm matching "1 + (r - 1) * ∑ l (fun i : nat => power i r)" in H.
Found no subterm matching "power l r" in the current goal.

original: split. - intros H. rewrite <- H. apply (all_ones_equation l). - intros H. symmetry. apply sum_powers_injective with (r := r) (n := l) (f := fun i => i) (m := l) (g := fun i => i). + apply Hr. + intros i j _ _ Hlt. auto. + intros i j _ _ Hlt. auto. + rewrite (all_ones_equation l) in H. rewrite <- H. auto.
